name: Points System (Central Bank)
author: BotMatrix Official
description: The central financial system for BotMatrix, supporting Global, Group, and Local points.

intents.name: check_points
intents.description: Check current user points in all tiers.

actions.name: transfer_global
actions.description: Transfer global points (cross-bot, cross-group). Requires official permission.

actions.name: transfer_group
actions.description: Transfer group-specific points (only valid within current group). Consumes group treasury.

actions.name: transfer_local
actions.description: Transfer bot-local points (specific to current bot instance).

actions.name: get_balance
actions.description: Get balance for a specific user and tier.
